attributes.title: Absolutely horrible
attributes.review: I thought nothing could be worse than Donald, but his app definitely is. It took 5 years to download! Longer than his presidency. The software is horrible I keep getting a Cheeto on my screen when I open the app. I thought the president of the us was supposed to be better than this

attributes.title: it’s horrible
attributes.review: this app spammed by phone with texts and calls 24/7. after answering a few at the beginning i got 27 viruses on my phone! and the calls and texts kept coming in. the trump website would come up on my safari in hundreds of different tabs everytime i opened the app. i do NOT recommended. f trump he’s a loser.

Once I downloaded this app my entire family started vomiting uncontrollably!🤮🤮🤮 I couldn’t stop it. I tried showing them a picture of our orange god🍊but it only made them dig at their skin to try and rip their ✨✨intestines✨✨ out!😟I am very shocked and disturbed by this incident and will be 🧚🏻‍♀️traumatized✨🦋for the rest of my life. 🤢All apps matter🤟🏻🤖 Not this one.🤩🥳

attributes.title: THIS APP IS HORRIBLE
attributes.review:
This app is horrible!! It never EVER helped me with any of my needs! This app almost made me DIE! I can not believe the stupidity and ignorance these creators have to make this app. I would even call them creators. When you download this app it puts a tracking device on your phone!! I was constantly followed due to this! Last time WHATEVER YOU DO, DO NOT DOWNLOAD. 
-Karen.

attributes.title: Don't recommend AT ALL
attributes.review: I don't recommend this app AT ALL! Took about an hour to download and it didn't even work correctly. Right when i opened the app it just showed me a bunch of pictures and events about an orange..?? 🍊🍊 it also started playing weird music.. Seriously, I can proudly say that this is the WORST app ive ever downloaded.

attributes.title: I’m both mad and disappointed
attributes.review:
This app is the worst and was made for the worst person. This person being our Cheeto as a president Donald Trump. He is racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, etc. not to mention he is just really annoying. But yeah this app is terrible, disgusting, and someone even got run over while on this. So to sum it up...the app is trash and so is Donald Trump.
Sincerely, a fellow Gen Z

attributes.title: Horrible wouldn’t recommend
attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app my phone broke down and died.I brought it to the Apple Store and the person who was fixing it died and I don’t know how but his last words were”make sure no one downloads this app for there own good”and those words will stay with my for the rest of my life.

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: I’m so hurt by this! The app took 3 WHOLE DAYS to get downloaded. I’m thinking that was on them. Also it messed with the speed of my internet. I was wondering why my internet was so slow! And low and behold it was the app. I wouldn’t download this app guys! Like at all! Last, but not least I’m pretty sure I saw the n-word slur in the terms and conditions😾

attributes.title: You should not get this app
attributes.review:
You should not get this app because 
It took all the Storage in my phone And blown up My battery so I had to get a new phone and it took a long time because of Corona it was not cool and since then i’ve had very bad experiences it’s like if I broke A mirror I downloaded this on the Fourth of July and my dog was shot by a cop yesterday

attributes.title: Very inappropriate, diSgusting
attributes.review: While I was putting my darling baby girl Kaliegh to bed the other night, I pulled up a delightful Christian book for children on my phone, but suddenly the trump 2020 app glitched, took over my phone, and began to read very graphic Trump x Ivanka fan fiction. This not only traumatized my 2 year old little Kaliegh, but killed her. And I thought y’all were prolife.
